title: Say it with words
brief_description: There are important differences between writing in private and speaking in public. This program demonstrates the following skills: preparing the speech, rehearsal, and the correct use of visual aids. A humorous program with Judy McBride, David Argue, Tracy Harvey and Mark Little.
